entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
